content: introducing the crochet better together afghan the first collaboration of jeanne steinhilber and michael sellick me in a blanket where two minds are better than one this was our third attempt as i kept changing my mind on the approach we inserted in favourites like the catherine wheel stitch alpine stitch and other classics to make it better together pattern can also be found on the crochet crowd website 1 1 https //thecrochetcrowd com/crochet-better-together-afghan-stitch-along/
